TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FlowDocumentPageViewer extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase

summary.span: 表示一种控件，该控件以固定查看模式查看流内容(一次显示一页内容)。

span.span: Represents a control for viewing flow content in a fixed viewing mode that shows content one page at a time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅允许一个 作为子元素。 allows only one as a child element. 以一次一页的查看模式显示内容。 shows content in page-at-a-time viewing mode. 类似的控件 以连续滚动模式显示内容。A similar control, , shows content in continuous scrolling mode. 和 都固定到特定的查看模式。Both and are fixed to a particular viewing mode. 另一方面， 还包括一些功能，使用户能够在不同的查看模式 (（由枚举) 提供）之间进行动态选择 ，但代价是比或更差 。On the other hand, includes features that enable the user to dynamically choose between various viewing modes (as provided by the enumeration), at the cost of being poorer performing than or . 下图显示了一个 具有默认值的控件 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 。The following illustration shows a control with its default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. ![屏幕快照：FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-main.png "屏幕快照：FlowDocumentPageViewer")![Screenshot: FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-main.png "Screenshot: FlowDocumentPageViewer") - **内容区域**-内容区域显示属性指定的的内容 。**Content Area** - The content area displays the contents of the specified by the property. - **工具栏**-默认工具栏停靠在内容区域的下方，并承载用于导航页面和更改缩放级别的控件。**Toolbar** - The default toolbar is docked underneath the content area, and hosts controls for navigating pages, and changing the zoom level. - **页面导航控件**-页面导航控件包含一个按钮，用于跳转到下一页 (向下箭头) 或上一页 ("向上" 箭头) ，以及当前页码和总页数的指示器。**Page Navigation Controls** - The page navigation controls include a button to jump to the next page (the down arrow) or previous page (the up arrow), as well as indicators for the current page number and total number of pages. - **缩放控件**-通过单击加号或减号按钮，用户可以使用缩放控件来增加或减少缩放级别。**Zoom Controls** - The zoom controls enable the user to increase or decrease the zoom level by clicking the plus or minus buttons, respectively. 缩放控件还包括一个用于调整缩放级别的滑块。The zoom controls also include a slider for adjusting the zoom level. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . - **搜索**-用户可以使用 Ctr + F 键盘快捷键，也可以使用 来切换用于在内容中查找字符串的搜索文本框。**Search** - The user can use the Ctr+F keyboard shortcut or you can use to toggle a search textbox that is used to find strings within the content. 有关更多信息，请参见 。See for more information. ## Examples 下面的示例定义 上图中的图。The following example defines the pictured in the figure above. [!code-xaml[FloaterFigureSnippets#_FlowDocumentPageViewerXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FloaterFigureSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_flowdocumentpageviewerxaml)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法 通过属性指定的值降低当前级别 。This method decreases the current level by the value specified by the property. 默认值 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 包括一个按钮，用于减小缩放。Default [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] includes a button to decrease the zoom. 如果属性返回，则调用此方法不起作用 `false` 。Calling this method has no effect if the property returns `false`.

span.span: Toggles the **Find** dialog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，Ctrl + F 提供用于切换 "**查找**" 对话框的键盘快捷键。By default, Ctrl+F provides a keyboard shortcut for toggling the **Find** dialog. 下图显示了具有默认 UI 的上的 "**查找**" 对话框 。The following figure shows the **Find** dialog on a with default UI. ![屏幕快照：FlowDocumentPageViewer 的“查找”对话框](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-find.png "屏幕快照：FlowDocumentPageViewer 的“查找”对话框")![Screenshot: Find Dialog of FlowDocumentPageViewer](~/add/media/flowdocpageviewer-find.png "Screenshot: Find Dialog of FlowDocumentPageViewer") 默认的 "**查找**" 对话框包括用于输入搜索文本的字段，以及 "**查找下一个**"、"**查找上一个**" 和 "**选项**" 按钮。The default **Find** dialog includes a field for entering search text, as well as buttons for **Find Next**, **Find Previous**, and **Options**. 默认情况下提供下列**查找**选项：The following **Find** options are provided by default: - 全字匹配Match whole word only - 匹配大小写Match case - 匹配音调符号Match diacritic - 匹配 kashidaMatch kashida - 匹配 alef hamzaMatch alef hamza

span.span: Arguments of the event.

summary.span: 只要未处理的 路由事件在其路由中到达此类，就会调用此方法。

span.span: Called whenever an unhandled routed event reaches this class in its route.

summary.span: 实现此方法可为此事件添加类处理。

span.span: Implement this method to add class handling for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法没有默认实现。This method has no default implementation. 如果继承中的中间类已经实现了此方法，则仍应调用基实现。You should still call the base implementation in case an intermediate class in the inheritance has implemented this method. 此方法的目的有些类似于 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] \* 方法上的事件模式：它提供了用类处理程序而不是实例处理程序来处理来自派生类的匹配事件的方法。The purpose of this method is somewhat similar to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event pattern On\* methods: it provides the means to handle the matching event from derived classes with a class handler instead of an instance handler. 在这种情况下，匹配事件是路由事件。In this case, the matching event is a routed event. 对于路由事件，On \* 方法的实现模式是不同的，因为路由事件可能是由子元素（而不是将调用处理程序的元素）引发的，因此，您的实现需要将事件参数的源属性纳入 (并且在大多数情况下都不应尝试重新引发事件) 。The implementation pattern of the On\* methods is different for routed events because the routed event might have been raised by a child element, not necessarily the element that will invoke handlers, so your implementation will need to take the event arguments' source properties into account (and should not try to re-raise the event in most cases). 当沿路由接收事件时，的子类可以调用私有类处理程序方法。Subclasses of could call private class handler methods when the event is received along the route. 一种可能的情况是采用事件的参数，并特意将事件标记为已处理。One potential scenario is to take the arguments of the event and deliberately mark the event as handled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 版本3.5 中引入。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](/dotnet/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取用户在中选定的文本 。The following example shows how to get the text that a user has selected in the . summary.span: 获取或设置 的不透明度。

value.span: 的不透明度。

span.span: The default is 0.4.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将设置 为0，则 是透明的，并且不可见。If you set the to 0, the is transparent and is not visible. 如果将设置 为1.0 或更高版本，则将不 透明，并且所选文本将不可见。If you set the to 1.0 or greater, the is opaque and the selected text is not visible. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，将 属性设置为粉红色，并将 属性设置为0.7。The following example creates a , sets the property to pink, and sets the property to 0.7. summary.span: 获取或设置 的当前缩放级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the current zoom level for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缩放级别受和属性的值约束 。The zoom level is constrained by the values of the and properties. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 缩放增量是在 执行或命令时增加或减少级别的百分比 。The zoom increment is the percentage by which the level is increased or decreased when the or commands are executed, respectively. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性。The following example shows how to use this property.
